title: Rune page not updating in champ select
body:
I'm not sure if it's always been like this or just takes heaps of time to update but new runes pages aren't updating properly in champ select. In game they had the right stats but in champ select it only showed about half the rune bonuses and still had the old page name.
Someone dodged the first game so I checked it was all saved properly and it was but still happened again in the next lobby (and still hasn't updated now in the next game).
